displayName.english: I acquired my first Destructive Shot!

I collected my first Transmulgifier!
I just saw my first SPIDER!  Yikes!
I've now collected 1,000 gold in this game total!
I've now amassed 5,000 gold in Zaxterion total!
If only Zaxterion gold was real money, 10k total baby!
Holy gold collector, I've now hit 25,000 freakin' gold in this game!
I gobbled up 500 gold in just a single game!
I collected 1,000 gold in just a single game!
Wow! I hoarded 2,500 gold in just one damn game!
I am one rich dude!  5,000 gold in just a single game!!

I was so close to death at just 1 hitpoint!

description.english: ..And then I started playing for reals instead of really playing around and rebounded to a full 100 hp!!

displayName.english: I'm getting the hang of living on the edge and being successful!

description.english: 5 times now I've rebounded from 1 hp to 100+ hp!!

displayName.english: You haven't truly lived if you haven't been so close to death that you see your own ghost!

description.english: 10 times now baby!  1 hp to full health!  Nobody performs better under pressure than me!

displayName.english: They say cats have 9 lives... I got 25 lives!  Bwah ha ha ha!

description.english: 25 times now I've scratched the surface of death and bounced back to full health!  *flexes*

displayName.english: I am a TRUE "Pog Champ"!! - I surpassed one million points without firing a single shot!
Pogs bouncing in space is MEGA-FUN! - I surpassed 500,000 points without firing a single shot!

description.english: I activated the first shuriken power-up from the Mothership!

displayName.english: Those damn shurikens are deadly AF!  ..And my skills prevented me from even getting a single scratch!
